title: Dark Star Singularity Help
body:
I wanted to play the latest game mode (Dark Star Singularity) and it gave me a weird error. 

The Error: http://imgur.com/a/bbXRl 
DxDiag: http://imgur.com/a/b0CNv

I have Directx 12. I thought this was the latest version. This is the first time I've gotten this error. Ever.  

Am I the only one experiencing this, or are there others getting this same error? Also, is there any fix for this?


Edit: I can't play any gamemode in league. It gives the same error no matter what. I tried playing norms. Got into champ select. Chose champ. Champ select ended. Error message comes up. {{item:3070}}

replies.body: There might be a bad game file or driver issue failing to render the featured game mode.  My suggestion would be to use the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix this up, starting with a repair.  You can also do most of these steps by downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  Do a repair first and test it out, and let me know if you have an questions.
Thanks! Running the Repair tool helped.
